name: dfvd2
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wvd2(w0, w1, w2), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))

-| wb(wi(wa(w0, w1), w2), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))

-| wb(wi(wa(w0, w1), w2), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))
